trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable"></xref> event of a class that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable"></xref>類別實作事件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event when the control has obtained the total number of records of the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>物件引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>事件，當控制項已經取得基礎資料來源物件的記錄總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control provides an event handler for this event named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項提供名為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>這個事件的事件處理常式</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: This event handler initializes page-related properties and creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件處理常式初始化與頁面相關的屬性，並建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>中所定義的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>事件主要由控制項開發人員使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PageEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PageEventArgs 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，由控制項開發人員主要使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>|The value of the `startRowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>|The value of the `maximumRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>|The value of the `totalRowCount` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>|值`startRowIndex`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>|值`maximumRows`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>|值`totalRowCount`參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on a page of data.
trans-unit.target: 第一個資料頁面上的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items to display on each page of data.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料頁上顯示的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The total number of records.
trans-unit.target: 總記錄數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of records to display on each page.
trans-unit.target: 取得要在每個頁面上顯示記錄的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to display on each page.
trans-unit.target: 每個頁面上顯示的記錄數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first record on a page.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一筆記錄的索引頁面上。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first record on a page.
trans-unit.target: 第一個頁面上的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料來源中的總記錄數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of records of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源記錄的總數。
